library_global_more_header: Can't find what you're looking for?
reader_error_source: You do not have any sources that go by the name of {{name}}.
reader_error_exist: The page you specified ({{page}}) does not exist.
reader_error_page: Page number is not a valid number. ({{page}})
reader_missing_volumechapter: There is {{volumes}} volume and {{chapters}} chapter missing.
reader_missing_volumeschapter: There are {{volumes}} volumes and {{chapters}} chapter missing.
reader_missing_volumeschapters: There are {{volumes}} volumes and {{chapters}} chapters missing.
reader_missing_volumechapters: There is {{volumes}} volume and {{chapters}} chapters missing.
reader_missing_chapter: There is {{count}} chapter missing. You might be spoiled if you continue.
reader_missing_chapters: There are {{count}} chapters missing. You might be spoiled if you continue.
sources_unsupported: This source is unsupported. Things may break, and you will not be able to reinstall this source if it is uninstalled.
sources_nsfw: The content this source can show may be inappropriate to minors.
search_no_sources_desc: You have no sources enabled, or some of your settings prevent sources from being displayed. Please check your settings.
settings_log_processedc: Processed chapter: {{chapterID}} from source {{source}} from source {{source}}. {{count}}/{{total}}
settings_clear_warning: This can't be undone! If you want to proceed, click the button {{count}} more time.
settings_clear_warnings: This can't be undone! If you want to proceed, click the button {{count}} more times.
setting_backup_restore_desc: This may overwrite some of your manga.
chaptermodal_error: An error occured while loading chapters.
shortpagination_error_inclusivity: pages must be less than maxpages
settings_general_locale_description: The language to use for the application.
settings_general_dateFormat_description: The format to use for dates.
settings_general_discordRPCIntegration_d: Enable full Discord Rich Presence integration. Disabling this will remove the presence from your status.
settings_general_autoUpdate_description: Automatically check for updates to the application
settings_general_minimizeToTray_descript: Send the window to the system tray instead of minimizing it.
settings_general_closeToTray_description: Minimize the window instead of directly closing it.
library_displayUserName_description: Display your OS name when in the library. Otherwise, simply show "Welcome Back."
settings_library_updateOnKeyPress_descri: Update search results upon every key press. If this causes performance issues, disable this.
settings_library_refreshCovers_descripti: When updating, also fetch the latest covers of the manga.
settings_library_ignoreArticles_descript: When searching, ignore articles (the, an, a) when searching for manga.
settings_library_searchSuggestions_descr: Show search suggestions when searching for manga. You can press SHIFT + TAB to fill in the search field.
settings_library_updateFrequency_descrip: How often to update the library.
settings_library_updateNotifications_des: Show notifications whenever the update cycle starts and ends, and when a new chapter is added.
settings_library_updateOngoingManga_desc: Only update ongoing manga when updating the library.
settings_appearance_theme_description: The look and feel of the application.
settings_reader_lightbarRight_descriptio: Display the lightbar on the right side if the vertical lightbar is enabled.
settings_reader_skipChaptersOfDifferentG: If the next chapter has the same chapter number but a different group/language, skip it.
settings_reader_skipChaptersMarkedRead_d: If the next chapter is marked read, skip it.
settings_reader_readingMode_description: The way the manga is read.
settings_reader_navLayoutPaged_descripti: Where you need to tap to navigate to the next/previous page.
settings_reader_invertTappingPaged_descr: Invert the way you tap to navigate to the next/previous page.
settings_reader_scaleType_description: The size of the page when reading.
settings_reader_cropBordersPaged_descrip: Crop the borders of the pages.
settings_reader_pageLayoutPaged_descript: The way the pages are laid out.
settings_reader_zoomStartPosition_descri: The position to start the zoom at.
settings_reader_navLayoutWebtoon_descrip: Where you need to tap to navigate to the next/previous page.
settings_reader_invertTappingWebtoon_des: Invert the way you tap to navigate to the next/previous page.
settings_reader_pageLayoutWebtoon_descri: The way the pages are laid out.
settings_reader_invertDoublePagesWebtoon: Swap the left and right pages when double-page layout is used.
settings_reader_allowZoomOutWebtoon_desc: Allow the user to zoom out past the minimum zoom level.
settings_reader_sidePaddingWebtoon_descr: The amount of padding on the sides of the pages.
settings_reader_useCustomColorFilter_des: Use a custom color filter when reading manga. Good for if the page has a hue shift.
settings_reader_filterR_description: The red hue of the page.
settings_reader_filterG_description: The green hue of the page.
settings_reader_filterB_description: The blue hue of the page.
settings_reader_blendMode_description: The blend mode to use when reading manga.
settings_downloads_deleteRemovedChapters: Automatically delete chapters that have been removed from the website.
settings_downloads_downloadNewChapters_d: Automatically download new chapters when a manga updates.
settings_downloads_location_description: Where to save the downloaded chapters. If your path has holes, the folder(s) will be created if it does not exist.
settings_downloads_removeAfterRead_descr: Remove downloaded chapters after you have finished reading them.
settings_downloads_removeWhenMarkedRead_: Remove downloaded chapters when you mark them as read.
settings_downloads_saveChaptersAsCBZ_des: Save downloaded chapters as a CBZ file instead of a directory of images.
settings_browse_checkForUpdates_descript: Periodically check for updates to sources.
settings_browse_onlySearchPinned_descrip: Only search for new chapters when the manga is pinned in the library.
settings_browse_showNSFWSources_descript: Show NSFW sources when browsing sources and manga.
settings_tracking_syncChaptersAfterReadi: Automatically sync the chapter list with the website after you have finished reading a chapter.
settings_tracking_trackWhenAddingToLibra: Automatically track new chapters when you add a manga to your library. This usually only works for silent-tracking sites like Komga.
settings_tracking_updateWhenMarkedAsRead: Update trackers when you mark a chapter as read/unread.
settings_advanced_sendCrashReports_descr: Send crash reports to the developer. This will help us fix bugs and improve the application.
